meanings.sent1: The child remained unawed by the loud thunderstorm outside.
meanings.sent2: She walked through the haunted house unawed by the spooky decorations.
meanings.sent3: Despite the magician's tricks, the unawed audience saw through his illusions.
meanings.sent4: The unawed explorer ventured into the mysterious cave without hesitation.
meanings.sent5: The unawed student calmly faced the challenging exam without any fear.

meanings.sent1: The brave knight stood unawed in front of the fearsome dragon.
meanings.sent2: Even in the dark forest, she remained unawed by the eerie sounds around her.
meanings.sent3: The unawed cat fearlessly chased away the much larger dog from its territory.
meanings.sent4: The unawed firefighter rushed into the burning building to save the trapped residents.
meanings.sent5: The unawed soldier faced the enemy army with unwavering determination.
